channel.description: Recent content in publications on Fink broker

item.title: Publications
item.description: List of publications from the Fink collaboration and the larger astronomy community that uses Fink public data. 2022 Impact of satellite glints on the transient science on ZTF scale, Sergey Karpov, Julien Peloton Fink: early supernovae Ia classification using active learning, Marco Leoni, Emille E. O. Ishida, Julien Peloton, Anais Möller 2021 Fink, a new generation of broker for the LSST community, Anais Möller, Julien Peloton, Emille E.
